snippet: Fulham's Clint Dempsey scored a hat trick, Aston Villa's Brad Guzan saved a penalty kick and Everton's Landon Donovan had an assist in a big day for American players in England.
abstract: Fulham's Clint Dempsey scored a hat trick, Aston Villa's Brad Guzan saved a penalty kick and Everton's Landon Donovan had an assist in a big day for American players in England.
lead_paragraph: Fulham's Clint Dempsey scored a hat trick, Aston Villa's Brad Guzan saved a penalty kick in injury time and Landon Donovan had an assist on Everton's opening goal in a memorable day for American players in England. All three were playing matches in the F.A. Cup, as the Premier League -- and the rest of England -- took a break from league play for a weekend of matches in the world's oldest domestic cup competition. For more, read our soccer roundup here.

headline.main: Dempsey Scores Hat Trick in Fulham's F.A. Cup Win
